_header: As I me lened to a land / I heard a shepherd
Title(s): A lord how gos þis word abowte
Subjects: evils of the time; friends, fickleness of; contemporary conditions
_description: On the evils of the times — seven quatrains with the refrain: ‘A lord how gos þis word abowte’
